tool_name: Fast Food Restaurants USA - TOP 50 Chains
tool_description:
Our Fast Food Restaurants API provides you with a comprehensive database of the most popular fast food chains, allowing you to access vital information about their locations, hours and web presence.

Sign up now to get access!
title: Fast Food Restaurants USA - TOP 50 Chains

api_list.name: GET all {City} names
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-food-restaurants-usa-top-50-chains.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants-top/all-city"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-food-restaurants-usa-top-50-chains.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all Restaurants by {Chain} & {City} & {State}
api_list.description: **10 results per request. Use page number for Pagination.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-food-restaurants-usa-top-50-chains.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants-top/{restaurantchainname}/location/state/{state}/city/{city}/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-food-restaurants-usa-top-50-chains.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
